participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: outgoing and confident, enjoys engaging in conversations and sharing opinions.
participant_1.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i hate the color pink. my father was a construction worker. i don't drink alcohol. i'm a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: creative and introspective, tends to be shy but has a strong passion for animal rights.
participant_2.background: i'm an animal activist. i have rainbow hair. i spend my time bird watching with my cats. my age is too old to say. the holidays make me depressed.
